en.title: [1Q 2025] Employment
en.description: Quarterly employment statistics, covering job creation, takeup, and vacancies, broken down by sector, sub-sector, and skill level.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly employment data, covering job creation, takeup, and vacancies, broken down by sector, sub-sector, and skill level.

bm.title: [ST1 2025] Guna Tenaga
bm.description: Guna tenaga suku tahunan, merangkumi pewujudan, pengisian dan kekosongan jawatan, mengikut sektor, subsektor dan kemahiran.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data guna tenaga suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi pewujudan, pengisian dan kekosongan jawatan, mengikut sektor, subsektor dan kemahiran.
